column3: News;Oddar Meanchey:------ According to the National Police Commissioner
column4: police cops arrest a suspect after using counterfeit casino chips.------This case occurred on October 25
column6: at 8:30 pm at Royal Hill Resort Casino O’Smach
column10: lives in Samraong.------The suspect was caught when playing a 5000 baht chip
column11: which the dealer was suspicious of.------After being questioned
column12: the suspect responded that he had purchased the chips from a man for 200
column14: in Kork Ampil village who went by the name of ‘Luk’ (*ironic)------The suspect was detained and sent to the Criminal Criminal Police Office at 6:30 pm on October 25
column16: the cops are preparing  for referral to the court for further proceedings.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/382090
